The six occasions for going to see an es: A time when a mendicant’s heart is overcome and mired in sensual desire
A time when a mendicant’s heart is overcome and mired in ill will
A time when a mendicant’s heart is overcome and mired in dullness and drowsiness
A time when a mendicant’s heart is overcome and mired in restlessness and remorse
A time when a mendicant’s heart is overcome and mired in doubt
A time when a mendicant doesn’t understand what kind of meditation to focus on in order to end the defilements in the present life.
